title: Effect of crowding out in the long run

content.question: Which of the following will most likely occur if a countryâ€™s government is continuously borrowing to finance its spending without changing taxes?

choices.label: The economy will experience an inflationary gap in the long run.
The government budget will be in deficit and the national debt will decrease.
The government budget will be in surplus and the national debt will increase.
Private investment in plant and equipment will decrease, resulting in a lower rate of economic growth in the long run.
Private investment in plant and equipment will increase, resulting in a higher rate of economic growth in the long run.

content.answer: Private investment in plant and equipment will decrease, resulting in a lower rate of economic growth in the long run.
